amendment.description: To provide for testing to confirm the material strength of previously untested natural gas transmission pipelines located in certain areas, and to update fiscal year references.

vote.text: Amendment SA 784 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 784 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S6616) To provide for testing to confirm the material strength of previously untested natural gas transmission pipelines located in certain areas, and to update fiscal year references.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 784 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Paul.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 784 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
